title: Doctor Who Revelation of the Daleks Fan Edit
description: The aim of this fan edit is to refocus the Revelation of the Daleks serial into a single episode, with all extraneous material cut out, specifically most of what does not relate to the active participation of the Doctor, particularly in the first episode. This is also an opportunity to lend a more modern approach to the adventure: it will be faster-paced and streamlined, with all unnecessary detail rooted out. The silly stuff is out too: the DJ is completely cut and Davros no longer makes the stupid decision of luring the Doctor into Nekros. No more Doctor tombstone.
